org.finra.herd.core.helper

Class ConfigurationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.finra.herd.core.helper.ConfigurationHelper

  • @Component
public class ConfigurationHelper
extends Object
    A helper for ConfigurationValue. Mainly used to facilitate access to current application's Environment object.

        String value

      • getProperty

        public static <T> T getProperty(ConfigurationValue configurationValue,
                                Class<T> targetType,
                                org.springframework.core.env.Environment environment)
        Wrapper for PropertyResolver.getProperty(String, Class, Object) using the given ConfigurationValue as the key and default value. Optionally, uses the configured default value if the property is not found in the environment. The configured default value must be of the same class, or must be a sub-class of the given targetType.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The return type
        Parameters:
        configurationValue - The ConfigurationValue with property key and default value.
        targetType - The returned object's type
        environment - The Environment containing the property
        Returns:
        The property value
